import React, { useState } from 'react' const user = [ { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, { name: "bittu", city: "kolkata" }, ]; export default function App() { const [page, setPage] = useState(0); function handleClick(e){ let scrollHeight = e.target.scrollHeight let scrollTop = e.target.scrollTop; let clientHeight = e.target.clientHeight; } return (
{user.slice(page).map((ele, idx) => (

{idx + 1}

{ele.name}

{ele.city}

))}
); }
